resources.string: My Name is Frederic Murry. My Github if FMurry. My student id is 007890870 Think of a question and click the button below.

string-array.name: fortunes
string-array.item: If you refuse to accept anything but the best, you very often get it.
Hard work pays off in the future, laziness pays off now.
Change can hurt, but it leads a path to something better.
Meeting adversity well is the source of your strength.
You will travel to many exotic places in your lifetime.
Your ability for accomplishment will follow with success.
Accept your past without regrets. Handle your present with confidence. Face your future without fear.
